scripts.pretest:examples: if [ $RUN_BY_ROOT_PACKAGE -eq 1 ]; then echo 'Thor solo already executed by root package.json...'; else yarn start-thor-solo; fi
scripts.posttest:examples: if [ $RUN_BY_ROOT_PACKAGE -eq 1 ]; then echo 'Thor solo will be stopped by root package.json...'; else yarn stop-thor-solo; fi
